amendment.description: Amendment provides that none of the funds authorized in the bill may be used to hire those people who are not legal to work in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill to employ certain workers under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 263 - 146 (Roll no. 857).
